posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hey man!

Here we go again LOL

Another build with 3 melee-classes and another CHA-based Dwarven Defender (although this time you did mix in some STR, which is nice).

It's nice to see something fresh being built, but there are a couple of things I don't agree with in this particular build:

1- Your Wisdom is 8, which means you can't cast spells, so why 6 Paladin? Is Taunt that important for the build to justify the taking of two more Paladin levels? Secondly, if 42 AB was low, imagine 40 on a non-self-buffer. Sure, you have Taunt which helps a bit, but Divine Favor and GMW would help a lot more if you had Paladin levels and Wisdom.

2- If you want to Taunt and have a better AB, I suggest going Paladin 16 Fighter 6 Dwarven Defender 18. You keep half of the DR, but gain +5 Divine Favor AB and Damage, +5 GMW AB and damage and many more Taunt updates to be spread throughout the build. You lose some HP and 9/- DR, you gain +10 AB and damage while buffed, more spells per day (you can even take Craft Wand to make wands of your long-lasting spells to make room for more short-term buffs).

3- Take 1 point off of DEX and put it in IT. That gives you access to IKD and Expertise, which are very good for this build, especially the latter.

Anyway, it's a fresh build and all, but unlike you, I am not surprised there are no builds with this class combo in the search engine. Builds with 3 melee classes tend to be very gimped save a few exceptions.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Bru
posts.content:
5 paladin levels are the minimum to take divine might, divine shield and extra turning, the sixth level is used to maximize Taunt. In summary, with 6 levels of paladin we obtain: divine grace to boost saves, immunity to fear and disease, divine damage, bonus to AC (Divine Shield), Taunt maximized (all this not dispellable). I do not think at all that this is bad for just 6 levels!
For IKD and Expertise ... in fact my first attempt in making this build has been with INT 13, but there is simply no space for these feats (without affecting its concept).
Finally, this is a tank build for PvM (not PvP), so AB 40 + Taunt is just enough for this context and for its role.
